tugboat.title: Front End Engineer
tugboat.name: Tugboat
tugboat.desc: Help content creators find supporters, offer products and subscriptions through a web interface.

projects.name: The Daily Beast
projects.info: Building and AB testing new layouts of the Beast, creating feature interactions using parallax, building CMS tools.

projects.name: Andrew Sullivan's The Dish
projects.info: Created new WordPress template for Andrew Sullivan's blog.

projects.name: Library of Congress Gutenberg Bible
projects.info: Silverlight 1.0 build of Libary of Congress kiosk interface for web, including 3D animation and zoom/pan interactions.

projects.name: BBC Olympics iPhone App
projects.info: Proof of concept built in Objective C.

projects.name: Sesame Workshop
projects.info: An accessible and progressively enhanced website for Sesame Workshop.

projects.name: Scholastic 39Clues
projects.info: Site and CMS built with custom interface in Javascript.

projects.name: Home Shopping Network Silverlight Player
projects.info: Built with version 1.0 Javascript version of Silverlight, a streaming video player with slide out menus.

projects.name: Vevo
projects.info: Vevo website with javascript playlist feature.

projects.name: BRVTVS Store Front
projects.info: Built on Big Cartel, Brvtvs is a New York based jewelry collection. The products listing is grid which stretches to fill the page width when resized.

projects.name: Sub Rosa
projects.info: jCarrotCell was built for Sub Rosa as a slideshow tool for presentations, the splash page, and CMS resource loader.

projects.name: SyFy Defiance Need Want Bar for TED 2013
projects.info: 2 x LCD Displays controlled by iPad apps for SyFy's show/game Defiance, simulating it's Need Want bar at TED 2013.

projects.name: Nike Flyknit Collective
projects.info: Showcase for Nike products, images, and art made/inspired by the Flyknit technique.

projects.name: Fashion Outlet of Chicago
projects.info: A pre launch site for the Fashion Outlets Chicago mall using 400 concurrent Javascript animations.

projects.name: FCUK Fragrance
projects.info: Minimal ecommerce site created for FCUK's fragrance lines.

projects.name: FCUK Friction
projects.info: Parallax effect micro-site for the launch of FCUK's new fragrance Friction.

projects.name: Neiman Marcus Rachel Zoe Facebook App
projects.info: Facebook application that creates a collage out of pieces from the Rachel Zoe collection and creates a composite image via canvas.

projects.name: Target GoTube for 2012 London Olympics
projects.info: A web interface that let's users retrieve or share their photos from the GoTube photobooth.

projects.name: GE Garages Event Board
projects.info: GE Garages took place at SXSW 2012, these digital applications were shown on the LCD displays and used on iPads to gather user input.

projects.name: GE For Woman By Woman
projects.info: Using an iPad to control the video, music, and images shown on LCD displays/Wall Projections, this application used the Node/Socket.io to broadcast and receive messages.

projects.name: Kate Spade Saturday
projects.info: A horizontal scrolling prototype for Kate Spade Saturday.

projects.name: Levi Bikeshop x Urbanoutfitters
projects.info: A Facebook app for Urban Outfitter + Levi's Bikeshop.
